title: Mall
data:
The **Mall** is a [special level](/wiki/Special_level_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Special level (SLASH'EM)") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It contains many [shops](/wiki/Shop "Shop") and various animals as well as its own [watch](/wiki/Watch "Watch"), much like [Minetown](/wiki/Minetown "Minetown").

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the Mall is incorporated as part of the [Town](/wiki/Town "Town") [dungeon branch](/wiki/Dungeon_branch "Dungeon branch").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Maps](#Maps)

  - [2.1 Variant 1](#Variant_1)
  - [2.2 Variant 2](#Variant_2)

- [3 Messages](#Messages)

- [4 See also](#See_also)

- [5 References](#References)

## Generation

The Mall has a 3⁄4 chance of being generated, and will be located on level 5 or 6 of the [Dungeons of Doom](/wiki/Dungeons_of_Doom "Dungeons of Doom").

It consists of a normal room-and-corridor level with four normal rooms and a large shopping-area room.

## Maps

There are two possible maps for the layout of the main shopping area.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) Both versions populate the mall with four [watchmen](/wiki/Watchmen "Watchmen"), three [watch captains](/wiki/Watch_captain "Watch captain"), four [muggers](/wiki/Mugger "Mugger"), and two [sewer rats](/wiki/Sewer_rat "Sewer rat"); the first variant will also have a [kitten](/wiki/Kitten "Kitten"), while the second will have a [little dog](/wiki/Little_dog "Little dog").

Both maps for the main room have the same chance of generating each type of shop:

1. 100% chance of a general store
2. 20% chance of a tool shop
3. 40% chance of a food shop
4. 20% chance of a scroll shop
5. 30% chance of a potion shop
6. 12% chance of a ring shop
7. 33% chance of a lighting shop
8. 12% chance of a book shop
9. 17% chance of a wand shop
10. 20% chance of a weapon shop
11. 22% chance of an armor shop

### Variant 1

(+ marks walls where shop doors will spawn and the letters mark shops as listed above.)

html:
Mall

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Mall is a special level that appears in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. It contains many shops and various animals as well as its own watch, much like Minetown.

In Hack'EM, the Mall is incorporated as part of the Town dungeon branch.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Maps
    • 2.1 Variant 1
    • 2.2 Variant 2
  • 3 Messages
  • 4 See also
  • 5 References

Generation

The Mall has a 3⁄4 chance of being generated, and will be located on level 5 or 6 of the Dungeons of Doom.

It consists of a normal room-and-corridor level with four normal rooms and a large shopping-area room.

Maps

There are two possible maps for the layout of the main shopping area.[1][2] Both versions populate the mall with four watchmen, three watch captains, four muggers, and two sewer rats; the first variant will also have a kitten, while the second will have a little dog.

Both maps for the main room have the same chance of generating each type of shop:

  1. 100% chance of a general store
  2. 20% chance of a tool shop
  3. 40% chance of a food shop
  4. 20% chance of a scroll shop
  5. 30% chance of a potion shop
  6. 12% chance of a ring shop
  7. 33% chance of a lighting shop
  8. 12% chance of a book shop
  9. 17% chance of a wand shop
  10. 20% chance of a weapon shop
  11. 22% chance of an armor shop

Variant 1

(+ marks walls where shop doors will spawn and the letters mark shops as listed above.)

The '''Mall''' is a [[Special level (SLASH'EM)|special level]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It contains many [[shop]]s and various animals as well as its own [[watch]], much like [[Minetown]]. In [[Hack'EM]], the Mall is incorporated as part of the [[Town]] [[dungeon branch]]. ==Generation== The Mall has a {{frac|3|4}} chance of being generated, and will be located on level 5 or 6 of the [[Dungeons of Doom]]. It consists of a normal room-and-corridor level with four normal rooms and a large shopping-area room. ==Maps== There are two possible maps for the layout of the main shopping area.[https://github.com/k21971/SlashEM/blob/8d5529799ad7ef36ed1eeca00f67a1d65c8e9c53/dat/mall-1.des SLASH'EM source code, dat/mall-1.des][https://github.com/k21971/SlashEM/blob/8d5529799ad7ef36ed1eeca00f67a1d65c8e9c53/dat/mall-2.des SLASH'EM source code, dat/mall-2.des] Both versions populate the mall with four [[watchmen]], three [[watch captain]]s, four [[mugger]]s, and two [[sewer rat]]s; the first variant will also have a [[kitten]], while the second will have a [[little dog]]. Both maps for the main room have the same chance of generating each type of shop:
  1. 100% chance of a general store
  2. 20% chance of a tool shop
  3. 40% chance of a food shop
  4. 20% chance of a scroll shop
  5. 30% chance of a potion shop
  6. 12% chance of a ring shop
  7. 33% chance of a lighting shop
  8. 12% chance of a book shop
  9. 17% chance of a wand shop
  10. 20% chance of a weapon shop
  11. 22% chance of an armor shop
